entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
